title: Traders Cheer Year-End Rally as S&P 500 Nears Record
description: US equities gained for a third-straight session Monday but closed just shy of a record as a year-end rally is taking hold amid bullish positioning in tech stocks.

title: Nvidia’s Biggest Southeast Asian Partner Dogged by China Chip Smuggling Questions
description: Singapore-based Megaspeed has imported tens of thousands more chips than Nvidia saw when checking its data centers.

title: Warner Bros. Has Done 'Masterful' Job, Ross Gerber Says
description: "This is quite a battle," Ross Gerber, co-founder and CEO of Gerber Kawasaki Wealth and Investment Management, says about the latest in the Paramount and Netflix bids for Warner Bros. He speaks on "Bloomberg The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
